listitem.para: Moves the turtle to an absolute X,Y,Z coordinate. The position input is a list of three numbers, the X, Y and Z coordinates.
SETPOSXYZ is designed to run in PERSPECTIVE mode. When used in 2D modes, SETPOSXYZ ignores the Z coordinate and moves the turtle to the given X and Y coordinates.

An example that draws a cube using SETPOSXYZ: CLEARSCREEN PERSPECTIVE SETPOSXYZ [0 100 0] SETPOSXYZ [100 100 0] SETPOSXYZ [100 0 0] SETPOSXYZ [0 0 0] SETPOSXYZ [0 0 100] SETPOSXYZ [100 0 100] SETPOSXYZ [100 100 100] SETPOSXYZ [0 100 100] SETPOSXYZ [0 0 100] SETPOSXYZ [0 100 100] SETPOSXYZ [0 100 0] SETPOSXYZ [100 100 0] SETPOSXYZ [100 100 100] SETPOSXYZ [100 0 100] SETPOSXYZ [100 0 0]
